net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.dnd

Class DropLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.dnd.DropLocation

  • public class DropLocation
extends Object
    Describes the location of a drop in relationship to the drop target. The location is seen in application code as a value of DropLocationIdentifier. This separates the meaning of the location from the geometry. This class defines the geometry for the DropTarget.drop(Transferable, DropLocationIdentifier, DropOption). There are several convenience implementations such as single(), aboveBelow(), etc. Please note that the static nature of these is for performance, it is not required to follow this pattern. Application developers are free to define their own implementations of DropLocationIdentifier.
    Author:
    Pat Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • aboveBelowUpon

        public static DropLocation aboveBelowUpon()
        Returns an instance of DropLocation that provides locations for above, upon and below the target using the AboveBelowUpon enum. The locations are vertical split with upon being the middle division.
        Returns:
        DropLocation.

      • set

        public void set(DropLocationIdentifier value,
                int row,
                int column)
         throws IllegalStateException
        Set the enum value to return for the given row and column. Rows are counted starting at zero from the top and increase going down. Columns are counted starting at zero from the left and increase going to the right. The result of Enum.name() passed to HTMLUtil.normalizeClass(CharSequence) and prefixed with "dnd-target-active-" will be used as the class name for the active target in addition to the standard active target class name. For example, an enum with the name "above" with become "dnd-target-active-above".
        Parameters:
        value - the value to set, may be null.
        row - the row.
        column - the column.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the object is immutable.

      • single

        public static DropLocation single()
        Returns an instance of DropLocation that provides a single location, i.e. rows = 1 and columns = 1. No enum value will be provided in the DropTarget.drop(Transferable, DropLocationIdentifier, DropOption) Enum argument.
        Returns:
        DropLocation.

      • treeNode

        public static DropLocation treeNode()
        Returns an instance of DropLocation that provides locations for tree nodes using the TreeNodeAboveBelowChild enum.
        Returns:
        DropLocation.
